Address.label: Address
Address.value: 333 NORTH CENTRAL AVENUE, PHOENIX, Arizona, 85004-2189, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Freeport-McMoRan Inc is an international mining company. It operates geographically diverse assets with proven and probable mineral reserves of copper, gold and molybdenum. The company's portfolio of assets includes the Grasberg minerals district in Indonesia; and mining operations in North America and South America, including the large-scale Morenci minerals district in Arizona and the Cerro Verde operation in Peru. It derives key revenue from the sale of Copper.
